system:
note description: "[ Container that allows custom placement of widgets. Widgets are placed relative to (origin_x, origin_y). Clipping will be applied. Items are ordered in z-order with the last item as the topmost. ]" legal: "See notice at end of class." appearance: "[ +---------------------+ | +--------+ | | | | | | +-+ Falselast +-------+ | | | |Falsefirst| | +-+ +-------+ +----+--------+-------+ ]" status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "container, fixed, custom" date: "$Date: 2016-06-07 05:13:25 -0700 (Tue, 07 Jun 2016) $" revision: "$Revision: 98875 $"
class ../interface/ev_fixed.xmlEV_FIXED
inherit ../interface/ev_widget_list.xmlEV_WIDGET_LIST redefine ../interface/ev_fixed.xml#f_implementationimplementation, ../interface/ev_fixed.xml#f_create_implementationcreate_implementation end
create ../interface/ev_any.xml#f_default_createdefault_create
feature -- Element change

an_item_y_position_assigned: a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_y_positiony_position = a_y an_item_width_assigned: a_width > 0 implies a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_widthwidth = a_height.Falsemax (a_widget.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_minimum_heightminimum_height) end
